snippet: In resigning, editors at the university’s student newspaper claimed interference, even censorship, by the nonstudent managers hired to oversee it.
abstract: Much of the staff of the University of Georgia's student newspaper resigns, claiming interference, even censorship, by non-student managers hired to oversee it.
lead_paragraph: In resigning, editors at the university’s student newspaper claimed interference, even censorship, by the nonstudent managers hired to oversee it.

headline.seo: Georgia Student Newspaper Editors Quit, Claiming Interference
headline.main: Student Paper Editors Quit at University of Georgia
headline.print_headline: Editors Quit At University Of Georgia
